Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Gus' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Gus and Ainsley , two members of Maggie 's group are introduced to Daryl , who briefly held Maya hostage. Maya explains that the place they were staying in was set on fire, and that Jen and Billy didn't make it out, while Matty was killed by something in the woods. She didn't see who did it, but Gus is certain the Reapers are responsible. Maggie asks about Hershel, to which Ainsley says that he was found by Kim , but she hasn't seen either one since. The conversation is cut short when Gus is abruptly shot in the throat with a silenced weapon.
Death[]: Killed By Pope (Caused) The Attacker Pope sends a Reaper out to hunt down Maggie's group. After the Attacker arrives in the woods, he discovers their location and shoots Gus through the neck. Given his brain was not destroyed, he may have reanimated later.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Gus has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Gus is the first resident of Meridian to die on-screen.
Name: Gus
